reward_output:
The user's goal is to switch to grid view and select the first image in the grid.
The user opened the app, navigated back, and clicked on the menu icon.
The current screen shows a menu with options like "Loop video on", "View in", "Delete from device", "Slideshow", "Help & feedback", and "Details". This is not the grid view. The user needs to select the "View in" option and then select "Grid view". Since the user has only opened the menu, they have not yet switched to grid view or selected the first image.

Reason:The user has opened the menu, but has not yet selected the "View in" option to switch to grid view, nor have they selected the first image.
